message: I think this is a fair starting point, Bob. Let's see what you think!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. Your turn to respond!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob.  Let's end this game!
I'm not giving up yet! I think I can do better than that. Your turn again, Alice!
This is my final offer, Bob. Let's split it evenly and call it a day!
